overview.en: Loopring is a protocol for building decentralized exchanges. Besides the protocol smart contracts, Loopring provides higher liquidity and price improvement by matching orders in the form of order-rings. With order sharing, multiple relayers can form a consortium for building a shared liquidity pool to compete with established exchanges. Also, Loopring combines off-chain order sharing and on-chain settlement.
overview.zh: 路印协议是新一代去中心化交易撮合协议，不仅拥有一套公开的用于执行交易和撮合操作的智能合约，而且还有一组链下参与者用来撮合和⼴播订单。路印协议采用去中心化技术，提供零风险的代币交易所模式，并允许多家交易所通过竞争，对同样的订单进行链外撮合及链上清结算。注：此为 LRC 官方发行的旧 LRC 代币。新 LRC 合约地址：0xBBbbCA6A901c926F240b89EacB641d8Aec7AEafD
